juicer.description: This heavy-duty, American-made juicer has a powerful GE motor that spins at 3,600 rpm to extract 20% - 30% more juice than pulp ejector models (according to independent laboratory tests). Large capaciy bowl hold a ful 1-2 quarts of fruits or vegetables - compared to just one pint for many brands. Easy-cleaning design with lift out disposable filter.
juicer.name: Omega Juicer
